consistency_check()

Throws an error if the number of directions or freuqencies (dim2) doesn't match with the second dimension of Y and sigma.

Load mat file from old matlab code, create a single isotropic job and return an IsotropicJob class

Attributes

dim2

apply_bad_gps_times(times_to_remove)

Applies bad gps times to current object in place. Includes a new attribute ntimes_removed to track how many times have been removed by cut.

calculate_broadband_statistics(alpha)[source]

The combined, time-averaged, broadband statistics.

The combined broadband segment-by-segment statistics

consistency_check()

Throws an error if the number of directions or freuqencies (dim2) doesn’t match with the second dimension of Y and sigma.

classmethod from_matlab_file(matfile)[source]

Load mat file from old matlab code, create a single isotropic job and return an IsotropicJob class

NOTE: mat file behaves differently if there’s only one segment.

need to be careful when opening it here.
